ClassDesc: Annotation which allows marking of views to be decoration views when added to a view pager. Views marked with this annotation can be added to the view pager with a layout resource. An example being @B_android#support#v4#view#PagerTitleStrip_E@. You can also control whether a view is a decor view but setting @B_android#support#v4#view#ViewPager#LayoutParams#isDecor_E@ on the child's layout params.
